Pit Mouse's Coal Mining Museum - The History of British Coal Mining

Entertaining, Interactive, Immersive, Educational

Step into the world of coal mining with "Pit Mouse's Coal Mining Museum," a VR application offering a humorous, immersive journey through British coal mining history. This adventure, free of rigid rules, combines clumsy humor with historical accuracy.

Built on "Archificial Intelligence," this app adds wonky unpredictability for a unique experience.

Key Features

    History of Coal Mining
        Immersive Tours: Explore 2000 years of coal mining with quirky AI narrator, Randolf.

    Pit Mouse Museum
        Interactive Career Path: Complete tasks to become a virtual coal miner.
        Meet Characters: Interact with Irene, Gerald Blastard, and Ted.
        Authentic Experiences: Descend mine shafts, operate machinery, and undertake mining tasks.
        Social Hub: Relax at the Pit Mouse Pub, play darts, and mingle with NPCs.

    Extras and Bonus Scenes
        Evolving World: New scenes and demos added regularly.
        Upcoming Tours: Guided mine tours and interactive experiences.
        Machinery Operation: Learn to operate mining equipment.
        views.

    Get Qualified
        Skill Development: Learn mining roles and earn certifications.

    The Mining Simulator (Coming Soon)
        Run Your Mine: Manage a virtual coal mine and boost production.

Join "Pit Mouse's Coal Mining Museum" for a blend of humor, history, and hands-on learning.
